text: I passed my GED  I m so happy rn     A while ago I was all depressed about high school  dreading that I would have to go through   more years of it  I started  th grade online  instead of brick and mortar because of social anxiety  That did not fix anything  really  I hate online school  and my grades were dropping drastically and my depression over school did not improve  So  with the help of my parents  I dropped out of  th grade  and we decided to go for the GED to get it over with     I took the entry test  a test to see what type of class you need  Fast Track being the quickest route as you don t need as much teaching  and I qualified for Fast Track     GED was like what I dreamed school could be like  There was a single  small classroom  with only around   other students  And the class only lasted up to  and a half hours  four days a week  for   weeks     Still  I had anxiety  like at normal high school  But it was much better because of the small number of people and very limited socializing  I have no idea why high school has to be so stressful  and difficult  I highly recommend getting a GED  if you don t like school  like me      I am so glad to have school finally behind me and ready for whatever comes next    amp x B unless if I want to go to college D
summary: I passed my Fast Track GED. I was depressed about high school and decided to go for the GED to get it over with. I highly recommend getting a GED if you don't like high school. I am glad to have school behind me.
cleaned: pass fast track depressed high school decide highly recommend get aged not like high school glad school

text: If I don t feel socially and romantically validated by the end of this year  I m going to either jump from my  th floor apartment window  stab myself to death  hang myself  or just overdose on sleeping pills Enough is enough  I ve tried fitting in as  year old with aspergers since i was   For   years I ve been anxious about being good enough  fitting in  having friends  being popular and finding a girlfriend  I destroyed my sense of self worth and identity and became a persona I now hate and never wish to grow back into  I ve only recently started to discover who i am  Even before that  my sucess in attending a normal elementary school and somewhat functioning with the other kids made people validate me for  fitting in  with the normal kids  Because of that I based and still base my value as a person off of that   I want to be confident  I want to be sucessful and not be anxious all the time  I wanna go to parties with other non social outcasts  get drunk  have a girl find me hot and attractive and have a sweet  caring girlfiriend who loves me  finds me funny  one I can be nice to  make her laugh  take her out to places  fall asleep on the couch watching movies together   But I m unatheletic  short for my country  im   the average height for guys is   have a high pitched voice and have a plain  if somewhat ugly face  No girl has ever said i looked hot  Ive never had a gf   I wanna be normal  And DON T tell me to wait  until someone comes along  When is that    years  No way Im sticking around for that long  fuck that  I ve suffered enough  I m not gonna go through more ardeous self improvement or shit like that  I d rather die   My only goal in life is to take a few of my other suicidal friends with me  because they are in the same position as me  There is no hope for people like us   I ve lived long enough for my parents  and other people s hopes and expectations for me

text: The biggest revelation I had last year  Ok so the title doesn t have much of an explanation so  I shall explain  Last year while I was doing some work experience for an electrical company  with this it was the usual jobs you get when you re new to a workplace  Grab the tools  bring the power drill  sweep the workshop  etc  while I was on a worksite I was having a conversation with my supervising tradesperson and here s how it basically went down  For the purpose of simplifying ill call the supervising tradesperson  tradie tradie   so what do you normally get at school in terms of grades me  I normally get the flat line of C s and the occasional B tradie  well you re in luck because grades are not important when getting hired me  you re joking and so the tradie I was with explained how that grades are absolutely useless unless you re getting into universities for degrees and qualifications  He explained that the only things employers care about are    A  Any experience about the job  B  Skills you got e g teamwork  problem solving   C  any qualifications that are in there  e g like a forklift ticket that allows you to legally operate a forklift D  The biggest thing stressed is being able to work in the team  without being an asshole and stirring the pot This blew my mind because it just debunks the constant thing of  you must get good grades to go anywhere  because you can still go places with C s rather than A s
summary: Last year, while doing some work experience for an electrical company, he learned that grades are not important when getting hired. The only things employers care about are experience, skills, teamwork problem solving, and qualifications. The biggest thing stressed is being able to work in the team without being an asshole.
cleaned: year work experience electrical company learn grade not important getting hire thing employer care experience skill teamwork problem solve qualification big thing stress able work team ass hole

text: Its just been way too long I ve suffered from unipolar depression since I was   I m nearly   The past week  I ve been having stronger thoughts about giving up  I mean  they re always there  but I can tell when they re getting dangerous  I m just so tired  I ve been struggling with this for so long  I ve tried so many things  therapists  pills  I self medicate a good deal with alcohol  I do it because you get drunk and time flies by and that s a whole bunch of time you didn t really have to live through  I waste my life because I just want it to end already  I m finding myself thinking that maybe its just time to go  I ve been thinking about buying a gun  As I get older  I m getting worse  The depression lasts longer  the periods of peace are smaller  I spent all of last year in an episode  to get two months of peace before going right back to it  I don t really want to die  but I can t live  I don t know what to do anymore  I tried  I really did  I tried to stay hopeful and try the things  but its been   years and I m never going to get better  I m giving it another week before I buy the gun  see if anything changes   But I doubt it will
